item.title: TSM
item.description: score:-15 Chances: TSMC reached its highest-ever level, indicating strong performance in the chip industry Global rally in chip stocks fueled by optimism about artificial intelligence bodes well for TSMC Risks: TSMC’s business is cyclical in nature, which may pose some challenges in the future Competition from global leaders like China and the US’s potential ‘CHIPS Act 2.
